summary.para: A replacement for the standard WinForms FolderBrowserDialog. Supports theming by DevExpress Skins.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.param: An IContainer descendant that owns this .

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.Description

summary.para: Gets or sets the description that is displayed above the folder hierarchy. Note that dialogs with the property set to Wide do not show their descriptions.

member.value: A String value that is the description displayed above the folder hierarchy.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.DialogStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the dialog style.

member.value: A DevExpress.Utils.CommonDialogs.FolderBrowserDialogStyle enumeration value that specifies the dialog style.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder

summary.para: Gets or sets the root folder from which the navigation starts. Note that this property is in effect only when a property set to Compact, wide dialogs always start with the root "Desktop" folder.

member.value: A object that specifies the folder from which the navigation starts.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath

summary.para: Gets or sets the selected path.

member.value: A String value that specifies the selected path.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraFolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not this should display the "New Folder" button.

member.value: true, if the "New Folder" button is visible; otherwise, false.

summary.para: A replacement for the standard WinForms OpenFileDialog. Supports theming by DevExpress Skins.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified settings.

member.param: An IContainer descendant that owns this .

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.CheckFileExists

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not this should warn a user if a file with the specified name does not exist.

member.value: true, to check file names; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.Multiselect

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not users are allowed to select multiple files in this .

member.value: true, if end-users can select multiple files; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.OpenFile

summary.para: Opens the file specified by the FileName property. The file is opened with read-only permission.

member.returns: A Stream that stores the selected read-only file.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.SafeFileName

summary.para: Returns the selected file name and extension. The returned name does not include the file path.

member.value: A String value that is the file name and extension.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraOpenFileDialog.SafeFileNames

summary.para: Returns an array of file names and extensions for all the selected files in the dialog box. File names do not include paths.

member.value: A String array that contains file names and extensions.

summary.para: A replacement for the standard WinForms SaveFileDialog. Supports theming by DevExpress Skins.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraSaveFileDialog.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified settings.

member.param: An IContainer descendant that owns this .

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraSaveFileDialog.CreatePrompt

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not this should ask users for the permission to create a file if the specified file does not yet exist.

member.value: true to display a message; false to automatically create a file without confirmation.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraSaveFileDialog.OpenFile

summary.para: Opens the user-selected file. The file is opened with read/write permissions.

member.returns: A Stream that stores the selected read/write file.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraEditors.XtraSaveFileDialog.OverwritePrompt

summary.para: Gets or sets whether or not this should warn users when they try to save a file under an already existing name.

member.value: true to display a warning, false to overwrite old files without confirmation.
